name: Interface LoaderHandler
text:
LoaderHandler is an interface used internally by the RMI
 runtime in previous implementation versions.  It should never be accessed
 by application code.

methods.method_sig:
@Deprecated
Class<?> loadClass (String name)
            throws MalformedURLException,
                   ClassNotFoundException
methods.description:
Loads a class from the location specified by the
 java.rmi.server.codebase property.

methods.method_sig:
@Deprecated
Class<?> loadClass (URL codebase,
                   String name)
            throws MalformedURLException,
                   ClassNotFoundException
methods.description: Loads a class from a URL.
Returns the security context of the given class loader.
